commands_en.response: Enables the Co-Stream script functionalities. NOTE: when using !setcoon (streamers) replace (streamers) by the streamer(s) making part of the co-stream session, separated by space

Group: Co-streaming Utility v.2.0.1
Type: Script Controlled Command

commands_en.group:
Group: Co-streaming Utility v.2.0.1
Type: Script Controlled Command

commands_en.response: Adds a new entry for the script, enabling the auto-shoutout function for (streamer). NOTE: replace (streamer) by the name of the person to be shout. If you are unsure on how to replace (msg), simply use Default instead, eg. !addcaster von_schappler Default
commands_en.group:
Group: Custom ShoutOut v.1.1.0:tv
Type: Script Controlled Command

Group: Custom ShoutOut v.1.1.0:tv

commands_en.response: Displays a chat message with the saved details about (streamer). NOTE: replace (streamer) by the name of the person which information is being requested, eg. !chkcaster von_schappler
commands_en.group:
Group: Custom ShoutOut v.1.1.0:tv
Type: Script Controlled Command

commands_en.response: Deletes (streamer) from the script database. NOTE: replace (streamer) by the name of the entry to be deleted
commands_en.group:
Group: Custom ShoutOut v.1.1.0:tv
Type: Script Controlled Command

commands_en.response: Edits the (streamer) option defined by (opt) to the new value (val). NOTE: before using this command, check the reference guide
commands_en.group:
Group: Custom ShoutOut v.1.1.0:tv
Type: Script Controlled Command

commands_en.response: Displays von Schappler's Destiny 2 characters info, based on the requested (info). For possible replacements for (info) and other details on how to use this, check this page

Group: External API
Type: External API Command

commands_en.response: Creates a clip of the last 30 seconds of gameplay and sends the link for it in chat
commands_en.group:
Group: External API
Type: External API Command

commands_en.response: Plays up to three sound effects in a single command call. The cost to use this command depends on how many sfx are played and how much is charged for each SFX. NOTE: when using !sfx (effects), always replace (effects) for the sound(s) trigger(s), separated by space. For a list of available sfx triggers and costs, use !sfxlist
commands_en.group:
Group: MultiSFX Script
Type: Script Controlled Command

commands_en.response: Displays a chat message with a list of sfx triggers (and its cost) to be used with !sfx (effects) command
commands_en.group:
Group: MultiSFX Script
Type: Script Controlled Command

commands_en.response: Allows the viewer to set their chatbot localization settings. Some commands will send responses in chat based on this selection. NOTE: replace (val) by en or pt when using the command, eg. !lang pt -w

Type: Script Controlled Command

Group: Viewer Information / Setup

Group: Viewer Interaction
Type: Script Controlled Command

commands_en.response: Displays a hug message directed from the user to (viewer). NOTE: replace (viewer) by the name of any active viewer in stream chat

Group: Viewer Interaction
Type: Script Controlled Command

Group: Viewer Interaction
Type: Script Controlled Command

commands_en.response: Displays a love message directed from the user to (viewer). NOTE: replace (viewer) by the name of any active viewer in stream chat

Group: Viewer Interaction

commands_en.response: Calculates how much the user loves (viewer) and displays a message in stream chat with the result of the calculation. NOTE: replace (viewer) by the name of any active viewer in stream chat

Group: Viewer Interaction
Type: Script Controlled Command

commands_en.response: Requests a song from a defined playlist, if songrequest is available. NOTE: replace (title - artist) by the name of the song and the artist, eg. !sr Apocalypse - Niviro

Group: Viewer Interaction
Type: Script Controlled Command

commands_en.response: Displays a chat message with a link to the playlist of songs available for request if songrequest is ON

Group: Viewer Interaction
Type: Script Controlled Command

commands_en.response: Displays a 'thank you' chat message at the end of a stream session. NOTE: the message is sent in both EN-US and PT-BR

Group: Viewer Interaction
Type: Script Controlled Command

commands_en.response: Displays a wake up chat message directed from the user to (viewer). NOTE: replace (viewer) by the name of any active viewer in stream chat
commands_en.group:
Group: Viewer Interaction
Type: Script Controlled Command

commands_en.response: Displays a 'welcome' chat message at the start of a stream session. NOTE: the message is sent in both EN-US and PT-BR
commands_en.group:
Group: Viewer Interaction
Type: Script Controlled Command

commands_en.response: Displays a welcome chat message directed from the user to (viewer). NOTE: replace (viewer) by the name of any active viewer in stream chat
commands_en.group:
Group: Viewer Interaction
Type: Script Controlled Command

commands_en.response: Adds a quote to the quote database. NOTE: replace (quote) by the text you wish to be quoted
commands_en.group:
Group: Visual Quotes a.0.0.1
Type: Script Controlled Command

commands_en.response: Deletes a quote from the quote database. NOTE: replace (id) by the quote id to be deleted
commands_en.group:
Group: Visual Quotes a.0.0.1
Type: Script Controlled Command

commands_en.response: Edits a quote from the quote database. NOTE: before editing a quote, ask for instructions on how to do it
commands_en.group:
Group: Visual Quotes a.0.0.1
Type: Script Controlled Command

commands_en.response: Displays a chat message with a link to the quotes list
commands_en.group:
Group: Visual Quotes a.0.0.1
Type: Script Controlled Command

commands_en.response: Displays a chat message with a quote from the quotes database. The quote is also displayed as a popup overlay. NOTE: if nothing is used as (id), a random quote will be displayed. If a (id) is used, it will display the requested quote. For the (id) quote list, use !lstquote
commands_en.group:
Group: Visual Quotes a.0.0.1
Type: Script Controlled Command

commands_en.response: Starts a boss fight. The results of the boss fight are displayed 2 minutes after the first call of the command. It's possible to join the boss fight, using !boss before the results are displayed
commands_en.group:
Group: Mini-games
Type: Internal Bot functions

commands_en.response: Starts an arena fight with other viewers. The fight starts after 2 minutes after the first call of the command and the minimum of 5 viewers are required for the fight to happen. Only ONE survirivor will be rewarded
commands_en.group:
Group: Mini-games
Type: Internal Bot functions

commands_en.response: Starts a PvP fight against (viewer). (viewer) has 2 minutes to answer the call to the fight. The winner gets the reward from the fight. NOTE: replace (viewer) by the name of another viewer active in stream chat
commands_en.group:
Group: Mini-games
Type: Internal Bot functions

commands_en.response: Starts a bank heist. A single viewer can attempt to heist the bank, which will give start 2 minutes after the first use of the command and other viewers have this time to join the attempt. NOTE: replace (val) by a number from 1 to 1000
commands_en.group:
Group: Mini-games
Type: Internal Bot functions

commands_en.response: Allows the viewer to glambe (val). NOTE: replace (val) by a number from 1 to 9999. It's possible to use the word all instead of a number to gamble all your coins
commands_en.group:
Group: Mini-games
Type: Command Controled by Script

Grupo: Custom ShoutOut v.1.1.0:tv

Grupo: Viewer Interaction
Tipo: Comando controlado por script

commands_pt.response: Mostra uma mensagem de chat onde o usuário expressa seu amor por (viewer). NOTA: troque (viewer) pelo nome de um viewer ativo no chat
commands_pt.group:
Grupo: Viewer Interaction
Tipo: Comando controlado por script

commands_pt.response: Calcula quanto o usuário ama (viewer) e mostra uma mensagem de chat com o resultado dos cálculos. NOTA: troque (viewer) pelo nome de um viewer ativo no chat
commands_pt.group:
Grupo: Viewer Interaction
Tipo: Comando controlado por script

commands_pt.response: Adiciona a música definida por (title - artist) à playlist de músicas, se o songrequest estiver ativo. NOTA: troque (title - artist) pelo nome da música e o artista, por exemplo: !sr Apocalypse - Niviro
commands_pt.group:
Grupo: Viewer Interaction
Tipo: Comando controlado por script

commands_pt.response: Mostra uma mensagem de chat com um link para a playlist de músicas disponíveis para serem usadas quando o songrequest estiver ativo
commands_pt.group:
Grupo: Viewer Interaction
Tipo: Comando controlado por script

commands_pt.response: Mostra uma mensagem de chat de agradecimento ao final da stream. NOTA: a mensagem é enviada em EN-US e PT-BR
commands_pt.group:
Grupo: Viewer Interaction
Tipo: Comando controlado por script

commands_pt.response: Mostra uma mensagem para acordar (viewer), enviada pelo usuário do comando. NOTA: troque (viewer) pelo nome de um viewer ativo no chat
commands_pt.group:
Grupo: Viewer Interaction
Tipo: Comando controlado por script

commands_pt.response: Mostra uma mensagem de chat de boas vindas ao início da stream. NOTA: a mensagem é enviada em EN-US e PT-BR
commands_pt.group:
Grupo: Viewer Interaction
Tipo: Comando controlado por script

commands_pt.response: Mostra uma mensagem para desejar as boas vindas a (viewer), enviada pelo usuário do comando. NOTA: troque (viewer) pelo nome de um viewer ativo no chat
commands_pt.group:
Grupo: Viewer Interaction
Tipo: Comando controlado por script

commands_pt.response: Adiciona uma quote para a base de dados de quotes. NOTA: troque (quote) pelo texto a ser mostrado como quote
commands_pt.group:
Grupo: Visual Quotes a.0.0.1
Tipo: Comando controlado por script

commands_pt.response: Deleta uma quote da base de dados de quotes. NOTA: troque (id) pela identificação numérica da quote a ser deletada
commands_pt.group:
Grupo: Visual Quotes a.0.0.1
Tipo: Comando controlado por script

commands_pt.response: Edita maa quote existente na base de dados de quotes. NOTA: antes de usar esse comando, consulte o manual de uso do script
commands_pt.group:
Grupo: Visual Quotes a.0.0.1
Tipo: Comando controlado por script

commands_pt.response: Mostra uma mensagem de chat com um link para a lista de quotes com suas IDs
commands_pt.group:
Grupo: Visual Quotes a.0.0.1
Tipo: Comando controlado por script

commands_pt.response: Mostra uma mensagem de chat com uma quote da base de dados de quotes. A quote também é mostrada na forma de um popup na tela. NOTA: se nada for usado como (id), uma quote aleatória será mostrada. Se (id) for fornecida, a quote selecionada será mostrada. Para a lista de quotes com suas IDs , use !lstquote
commands_pt.group:
Grupo: Visual Quotes a.0.0.1
Tipo: Comando controlado por script

commands_pt.response: Inicia uma luta contra um boss. Os resultados da luta são mostrados 2 minutos após o primeiro uso do comando. É possível se juntar à luta, usando !boss antes que os resultados sejam mostrados
commands_pt.group:
Grupo: Mini-games
Tipo: Funções Internas do Bot

commands_pt.response: Inicia uma luta entre viewers. A luta terá início 2 minutos após o primeiro uso do comando e o mínimo de 5 viewers é necessário para que a batalha aconteça. Apenas UM sobrevivente recebe a recompensa
commands_pt.group:
Grupo: Mini-games
Tipo: Funções Internas do Bot

commands_pt.response: Comaça uma luta  PvP contra (viewer). (viewer) tem 2 minutes responder ao chamado de luta. O vencedor recebe a recompensa a luta. NOTA: troque (viewer) pelo nome de um viewer atifo no chat de stream
commands_pt.group:
Grupo: Mini-games
Tipo: Funções Internas do Bot

commands_pt.response: Começa um roubo a um banco. Um único participante pode tentar roubar o banco, cuja tentativa ocorrerá dois minutos após o comando ser usado pela primeira vez no chat. Outros viewers podem se juntar a essa tentativa de roubo durante esse tempo. NOTA: troque (val) por um número entre 1 e 1000
commands_pt.group:
Grupo: Mini-games
Tipo: Funções Internas do Bot

commands_pt.response: Permite ao viewer apostar (val). NOTA: troque (val) por número entre 1 e 9999. É possível apostar todas as suas vsCoins usando all ao invés de um número ao usar o comando
commands_pt.group:
Grupo: Mini-games
Tipp: Comando controlado por Script
